Name: luy-mohammadramadha
Author: Mohammad Ramadhan Sebwa, Ramadhan Hajj Ndeka, Ismail Were, Musa Murasi Salim Kukuya, Yusuf Shiundu Malala, Yahya Wafula Ojwang, Haroon Albert Msah

Translations.Text: Naboola mbu: “kata nebarerera kobulunjifuobulayiokhushilabiamwanyoola basenywe Nibali ninabwo?” nibaboola mbu: “efwetoto khukhayilesa akamwarumwa ninako ako.”
Mana nikhubatila khumabii kabakhola, kho hengakhwo, indukho yabakhayi shingala yali
Ne olwa Ibrahim baboolela Samwana nende Abandu bebe mbu; “ toto esie endi ehale nenda kamulaamanga ako.”
Halali ulia owalonga niye ulalunjisia
Ne nekhola lino okhuba likhuwa liatong’a khwulwibulo lulwe, bakhababario banyoola okhukalukha
Halali khwasangasia bano nende abebusi babu okhula shiga obwatoto bwaboolela nende Omurumwa Omwinoosi
Ne olwa obwatoto bwaboolela baboola mbu: “ buno ni obulosi ne efwe toto khubukhayile”
Ne nibaboola mbu: “shichila shina Ikurani ino nileshela khumundu omukhongo mumatokho amakhongo kabili kano?”

Nohomba abo nibo bakabanga tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi? Efwe khwabakabila obulamu bwabu bwokhushialo hakari wabu, ne nikhuninia abaandi okhushila abaandi khubichelo, kho abaandi banyoole okhukholela abaandi emilimo, ne tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye wuwo tsishila bioosi biabakhung’asinjia
Ne Abandu bakhaya okhuba omukanda mulala, khwakhakholele balia abakhaya Nyasaye tsinzu tsiabu okhuba nende eshitsafu sheifedha, nende tsingasi tsiabu tsiosi tsiabaninilanga
Nende emiliango chietsinzu tsiabu nende ebitanda biabayiekhangakhwo
Nende oburone. Halali ako shinishiosi shiosi tawe, halali ni omwikhoyo kwobulamu bwomushialo muno butswa, ne mwikulu ili ewa Nyasaye wuwo Omulesi niyabalia abaria Nyasaye
Ne ulia wikhola omuwofu khumakhuwa ka Nyasaye, khulamukholela Shetani abe omwitsa wuwe
Ne totobo babekalilanga injila, ne abeene baparanga mbu balunjika
Okhula shinga balikhwitsila baliboola mbu: “ oh manyanga oba ehale ninasi shinga ebukwe nende mumbo, oli omwitsa omubii muno.”
Ne khulwokhuba mbu mwakhola obubii, shibulaho shilabakhoonya enywe olwalelo mbu musanganga mwesi mushinyasio
Koo onyala okhukhola abekala amarwi bawulila, nohomba onyala okhulunjisia abawofu bali mubukori bwahabulafu
Ne kata nikhukhuhiniaho, efwe khwitsa okhubahelesia likhobo liefu khubo
Nohomba	khulakhwechesia akakhwabalaka, nafu toto khuli nende obunyali khubo
Mana tilana nende akawafimbulilwa , toto ewe oli khunjila ingololofu
Netoto kano ni ametsulisio khwiwe nende khubandu bao, ne mulitsa okhurebwa
Ne reba Abakhwaruma imbeli wuwo mubarumwa befu, koo khwakhola abanyasaye bandi balamwe balali Owetsimbabaasi ? (Nyasaye)
Ne toto khwaruma Musa nende ebimanyisio biefu khu Firaun nende aboluyali baye, mana naboola mbu: “ esie endi Omurumwa wa Nyasaye Omulesi webilonje biosi” israeil
Olwa yabetsela nende ebimanyisio biefu bachaka okhumutseshela
Ne shikhwabechesia eshimanyisio shiosi shiosi halali eshikhongo muno okhushila eshindi, mana nikhubatila khushinyasio kho banyoole okhukalukha
Nibaboola mbu: “enywe Abalosi, khusabile Nyasaye indache yayakhulaka,(nakhurusiliaho eshunyasio shino luno) efwe toto khulalunjikha.”
Olwa khwabarusiliaho eshinyasio esho, habwene nahabwene nifunaka indache
Firaun nalaanga Abandu bebe nababoolela mbu: “enywe Abandu banje shendi Omwami welitokho lia Misri, ne emialo chino chiburanga hasi wanje, koo shimulolngakhwo tawe?”
Nohomba esie shendi noluyali okhushila omutakha uno, ulanyala okhurusia amakhuwa obulayi tawe
Ne shichila shina nakhaya okhufwala ebindu bieyidhahabu, nohomba yetse nende Amalaika halala ninaye bokhumukhoonya
Mana nabayila Abandu bebe mana nibamufuchilila, toto abo bali Abandu abakori
Olwa bakhusinyisia khwabatila obutinyu mana nikhubasishia mumaatsi boosi
Ne nikhubakhola okhuba abaranjilili nende eshilolelo khubandu beyinyuma
